mapper.select: select count(*) from MOD_MissionCategory where large_category like '%'||#{category}||'%' or small_category like '%'||#{category}||'%'

select mission_category_id, large_category, small_category, r from (select mission_category_id, large_category, small_category, rownum r from (select mission_category_id, large_category, small_category from MOD_MissionCategory where large_category like '%'||#{category}||'%' or small_category like '%'||#{category}||'%' order by large_category, small_category) order by large_category, small_category) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
select count(*) from MOD_MissionCategory where large_category like '%'||#{mission}||'%' or small_category like '%'||#{mission}||'%'
select count(*) from MOD_MissionInfo where mission_title like '%'||#{mission}||'%'
select count(*) from MOD_MissionInfo where mission_contents like '%'||#{mission}||'%'

select aa.* from (select a.*, rownum r from (select m.*, c.large_category, c.small_category , c.category_image from MOD_MissionCategory c, MOD_MissionInfo m where c.mission_category_id=m.mission_category_id and m.mission_title like '%'||#{mission}||'%') a order by large_category, small_category) aa where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
